name: Gears of The Alternate World
description:
This is a space-shooter game with a PS1 aesthetic and feel using a steampunk aesthetic! Enjoy blasting down ships and achieving the high score!

CONTROLS

Move Left/Right:

Left/Right (Keyboard)

Analog Stick or D-Pad Left/Right (Controller)

Shoot:

Z (Keyboard)

Bottom Face Button (Controller)

Die:

Escape (Keyboard)

Start (Controller)

CREDITS

Programming - Matthew Dadoun, scriptorious

Sound - Bonsamu

Music - Coasterfan312

3D Art - Rex
